about_the_game:
In a world once whole, cataclysmic events shattered the land into countless floating islands, each with its unique ecosystem and challenges. Embark on an epic quest in Skyrift: The Shattered Sky, where you, alongside a team of intrepid adventurers, strive to restore harmony to a fractured realm.

Join the legendary hero Aeron in this strategic 3D roguelike adventure, set against a backdrop of verdant forests, arid deserts, and ethereal space realms. Your journey begins from a central village on a large floating island, the hub for all restoration efforts. Gather resources, upgrade structures, and plan your expeditions to reunite the fragmented islands and lost continents.

Key Features:

Dynamic World Exploration: Traverse diverse floating islands, each with its distinct environment, from lush forests teeming with life to harsh deserts and cosmic anomalies.

Ancient Temples: Discover and modify dormant celestial observatories that hold the key to restoring balance. Use collected modules to transform these temples into powerful spawners, influencing enemy dynamics and resource generation.

Strategic Gameplay: Balance resource gathering, combat, and temple modifications. Navigate a dynamic day-night cycle that affects enemy behavior, resource availability, and the overall urgency of your missions.

Rich Narrative: Uncover the secrets of the shattered world, the true purpose of the Core of Unity, and the history behind the cataclysm. Face off against the enigmatic figure wielding remnants of the Core's power in a final epic showdown.

Epic Showdown: Confront the last boss, whose quest for dominion led to the world's fragmentation. Learn from his mistakes, restore the temples, and reforge the Core of Unity to bring the world back together.

Experience a captivating tale of restoration and unity in Skyrift: The Shattered Sky. Forge your path, reunite the realms, and restore harmony to a world forever changed.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1030 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Sound Card: most audio board
